short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Capture and customize screenshots & share them via ZoomSphere.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Looking for a powerful tool to capture and compile data and graphs from a wide range of social media platforms and analytics tools? Our Chrome extension has got you covered! With just a few clicks, you can capture screenshots of data and graphs from platforms like Facebook Ads Manager, LinkedIn Analytics, Google Analytics, and more. You can even capture screenshots of social media posts from your competitors for further analysis.

But that's not all! With our extension, you can customize and edit your screenshots by cropping or adding annotations, giving you greater control over the data you're presenting. And when you're ready to share your screenshots, our seamless integration with ZoomSphere makes it easy to compile your screenshots into comprehensive reports that can be shared with clients in real-time.

Key Features:

- Capture and customize data and graphs from a wide range of social media platforms and analytics tools
- Edit and crop screenshots to highlight important data points
- Share screenshots in real-time via ZoomSphere chat rooms
- Download screenshots for use in other applications or reports

Stop wasting time manually compiling data and graphs from multiple sources. Upgrade to our Chrome extension today and streamline your reporting process!
